attributes.action: Not to deny people in the early and late stages of Alzheimer’s disease access to drug treatments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Over 100,000 people will develop dementia this year; yet NICE has completely ignored the devastating effect that this decision will have not just on these people but their carers too. I would ask that this flawed decision be urgently reviewed.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Not to deny people in the early and late stages of Alzheimer’s disease access to drug treatments."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14437.asp
